WEATHER FORECAST FOR 14 AUGUST 2024
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 14 August 2024

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in
Galle and Matara districts.

S
howers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places  elsewhere  of  the  island  during  the
evening or night. Fairly heavy showers above 50 mm are likely at some places.

F
airly strong winds of about (30-40) kmph can be expected at times over Western slopes of the
central  hills  and  in  North-western  province  and  in  Ampara,  Monaragala  and  Hambantota
districts.
General public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused
by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
